name: alt-key
description: Minimal extension that registers configuration under the altKey.* namespace for use in when-clauses and context debugging.

altKey.arrows.description: Support arrow key navigation for UI component navigation. Use config.altKey.arrows in when-clauses.

altKey.enabled.description: Enable AlterNative altKey behaviors. Access in when-clauses as config.altKey.enabled.

altKey.orientation.description: Preferred navigation orientation ('default' uses VS Code defaults). Use in when-clauses as config.altKey.orientation == 'left'.

altKey.vi.description: Support VI key (h, j, k, l) navigation for UI component navigation. Use config.altKey.vi in when-clauses.

altKey.wrap.description: When navigating across UI components, wrap around at screen edges. Use config.altKey.wrap in when-clauses.
